description: This Healthy Orange Sauce Recipe has so much flavor and is great for adding to a stir fry!
name: Healthy Orange Sauce Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup orange juice, I like to use fresh squeezed

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a jar, or bowl, and whisk until completely combined. Heat a skillet or small pot over medium heat and pour orange sauce in.
Cook until sauce is thickened and coats the back of a spoon, stirring consistently, about 5 minutes. Mix in or pour over desired foods.
This can also be used a stir fry sauce by pouring on top of your stir fry in the last few minutes of cooking and letting sauce thicken with your stir fry.

video.description:
These Orange Tofu and Chickpea Bowls are packed with protein, veggies and tons of flavor!  Recipe is perfect for a 30 minute dinner or a meal prep lunch!

Recipe: https://www.shelikesfood.com/orange-tofu-chickpea-bowls-meal-prep/
video.name: Orange Tofu and Chickpea Bowls
